MatchedTerms.CandidateTerm: checkbox: I have read, and agree to abide by the [H]ard|Forum rules. (agree)
MatchedTerms.TargetTerm: checkbox: I have read, and agree to abide by the NetStumbler.org WiFi Forums rules. (agree)

MatchedTerms.CandidateTerm: select: All timestamps displayed on the forums can be automatically corrected to show the correct time for your location in the world. Simply select the appropriate time zone from the list below. (timezoneoffset)
MatchedTerms.TargetTerm: select: All timestamps displayed on the forums can be automatically corrected to show the correct time for your location in the world. Simply select the appropriate time zone from the list below. (timezoneoffset)

MatchedTerms.CandidateTerm: select: In addition, you may set the appropriate option to allow for daylight savings time in your part of the world. (dst)
MatchedTerms.TargetTerm: select: In addition, you may set the appropriate option to allow for daylight savings time in your part of the world. (dst)

MatchedTerms.CandidateTerm: checkbox: Receive Email from Other Members (options[showemail])
MatchedTerms.TargetTerm: checkbox: Receive Email from Other Members (options[showemail])
